snippet: Many of the business world’s titans stay in shape at Sitaras Fitness, a Midtown Manhattan gym that is the brainchild of a bodybuilder. He — and his software — track the members’ progress.
abstract: Many of the business world’s titans of business and finance stay in shape at Sitaras Fitness, a Midtown Manhattan gym that is the brainchild of bodybuilder John Sitaras; he and his software track the progress of gym's 140-plus members; his proprietary personal training program separates his center from other high-end clubs.
lead_paragraph: Many of the business world’s titans stay in shape at Sitaras Fitness, a Midtown Manhattan gym that is the brainchild of a bodybuilder. He — and his software — track the members’ progress.

headline.seo: Sitaras Fitness, Where Business Titans Work Out
headline.main: Trying to Feel Like a Million Bucks, Too
headline.print_headline: Trying to Feel Like a Million Bucks, Too
